member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Displays an message that the login was successful.

member.summary: Displays an message that the session is already active.

member.name: M:TwitterTermometer.NotifierHandler.ShowTweetSuccess
member.summary: Displays an message that the tweet was posted.

member.name: M:TwitterTermometer.NotifierHandler.ShowTweetAlreadyPosted
member.summary: Displays an message that the tweet has already been posted.

member.name: M:TwitterTermometer.NotifierHandler.ShowLoggedOut
member.summary: Displays an message that the session has ended.

member.summary: Displays an error message that indicates the form authenticity key could not be obtained.

member.summary: Displays an error message that indicates the form url is invalid.

member.summary: Displays an error message that indicates the form Href is invalid.

member.summary: Displays an error message that indicates the request failed.

member.summary: Displays an error message that indicates the response status code is bad.

member.name: T:TwitterTermometer.PostData
member.summary: Connects to the request server performing the requested tasks and appropriate validation.

member.name: F:TwitterTermometer.PostData.UNKNOWN_PAGE_RETURNED
member.summary: Returns the servers error request page information HTML index.

member.name: F:TwitterTermometer.PostData.m_userAgent
member.summary: The value of the User-agent HTTP header. The default value is Nothing.

member.name: F:TwitterTermometer.PostData.m_timeoutSeconds
member.summary: The number of milliseconds to wait before the request times out. The default value is 100,000 milliseconds (100 seconds).

member.name: F:TwitterTermometer.PostData.m_forumUrl
member.summary: The URL of the web application. Passed to the constructor during initialization.

member.name: F:TwitterTermometer.PostData.m_formMethod
member.summary: The request method to use to contact the Internet resource. The default value is GET.

member.summary: The form's authenticity token.

member.summary: A CookieContainer that contains the cookies associated with this request.

member.summary: Details about the last notified message experienced.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the Class.

member.name: E:TwitterTermometer.PostData.AuthenticityToken
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the PostData event of .
member.remarks: Displays all relative post data patterns including authenticity token.

member.name: E:TwitterTermometer.PostData.ReturnedPageSource
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the PostData event of .
member.remarks: The most recent HTML source retrieved from the server.

member.name: E:TwitterTermometer.PostData.LoggedOut
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the PostData event of .
member.remarks: Notifies the session has been cleared.

member.name: M:TwitterTermometer.PostData.AttemptLogin(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to login to the server with the supplied username and password.
member.param: If true, the user will be remembered by the server.

member.name: M:TwitterTermometer.PostData.AttemptLogout
member.summary: Forces a logout of the current session. Regardless of the return value, the session will no longer be useable after this call. The use must be logged in again.

member.name: M:TwitterTermometer.PostData.TryGetServerAuthenticityToken(System.String)
member.summary: This gets values from the token page source, such as form authenticity token.

member.summary: Get's an absolute URI based on the ForumURL and a path relative to it.

member.summary: Returns True if this PostData object is associated with an authenticated session, otherwise False.

member.summary: Returns a string value if a match is found else returns an empty string.
